Why did I get a site? The tag-line says it all.
My non-industry mom has been advising me to get a personal site for a while now so I can share a bit of myself with the world.

So let’s get to know me a bit better:
Who am I?
I’m Preksha Kashyap (Preɪkʃa Kʌʃyʌp for those of you who know a thing or two about the International Phonetic Alphabet). You could liken the pronunciation of my name to: Pray-ksha Cush-yup as well.
I’m currently an undergraduate student of Computer Engineering programme at the University of Waterloo!
